mapper.select: SELECT u."userid" AS userId, u."firstname" AS firstName, u."lastname" AS lastName, u."ssn" AS ssn, u."email" AS email, u."password" AS password, u."role" AS role FROM public."user" u

SELECT u."userid" AS userId, u."firstname" AS firstName, u."lastname" AS lastName, u."ssn" AS ssn, u."email" AS email, u."password" AS password, u."role" AS role FROM public."user" u WHERE u.userid = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "user" (email, password, firstname, lastname, ssn, role) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{ssn}, #{role});
mapper.select: SELECT u."userid" AS userId, u."firstname" AS firstName, u."lastname" AS lastName, u."ssn" AS ssn, u."email" AS email, u."password" AS password, u."role" AS role FROM public."user" u WHERE u."email" = #{email}
SELECT s."studentid" AS studentId FROM public."student" s INNER JOIN public."user" u ON s.userid = u.userid WHERE u."email" = #{email}
SELECT s."studentid" AS studentId FROM public."student" s INNER JOIN public."user" u ON s.userid = u.userid WHERE u."userid" = #{userId}
SELECT p."professorid" AS professorId FROM public."professor" p INNER JOIN public."user" u ON p.userid = u.userid WHERE u."email" = #{email}

SELECT u."userid" AS userId, u."firstname" AS firstName, u."lastname" AS lastName, u."ssn" AS ssn, u."email" AS email, u."password" AS password, u."role" AS role, e."mark" AS mark, e."isValidated" AS validated FROM public."user" u INNER JOIN student s ON u.userid = s.userid INNER JOIN enrollment e ON s.studentid = e.studentid INNER JOIN course c ON e.coursecode = c.coursecode WHERE c.coursecode = #{courseCode}
